storyInfo: As the war approaches its end, Babel's landship is stripped of all its defenses, and the assassins targeting Theresa flood in.

attributes.content: Outside Rhodes Island of Babel, Kazdel
Babel is defenseless, as the Regent said.
attributes.name: Determined Assassin

attributes.content: Keep quiet. Stay alert.
attributes.name: Cautious Assassin

attributes.content: Stick to the original route and find the King. A Route and B Route, stand by.
attributes.name: Cautious Assassin

attributes.content: Their main force is not on the ship. They will need time to call for support.
attributes.name: Determined Assassin

attributes.content: Babel's guards still haven't noticed us.
attributes.name: Determined Assassin

attributes.content: His Highness was right. There is someone high up in the enemy's chain of command helping us.
attributes.name: Cautious Assassin

attributes.content: All units, enter the ship. We settle this quickly. Avoid anything unexpected.
attributes.name: Cautious Assassin

attributes.content: Ten minutes ago, Amiya was roused by a strange sound.
Babel is continually being maintained and renovated. It has already seen massive changes compared to when she first arrived at her new home.
'Maybe Closure is busy fixing things again?'
The Doctor left Amiya many picture books in her room, with illustrated stories she had never heard of before.
Her favorite is one that tells of someone who falls from the sky riding a fantastical vehicle, and the many adventures that come of it.
But she is not fond of the ending. The hero repairs the vehicle and has to return to the sky, saying goodbye to the children on the ground.
I really don't like all this noise. The Doctor still isn't here...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Theresa... I need to go find Theresa.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hello, Mr. Downing! You dropped your pliers on the ground. Here!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Thank you, Amiya. Where are you going?
attributes.name: Babel Member

attributes.content: I'm going to the Speaker's Office to find Theresa. Oh, right. Have you seen the Doctor?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The Doctor? It's been a few days. That one ought to be in the Command Center overseeing the operation, I think?
attributes.name: Babel Member

attributes.content: I knew the Doctor must be busy with something... Okay. Bye-bye!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Don't run so fast, Amiya! There's still a lot of places being overhauled on the ship, so make sure you don't trip!
attributes.name: Babel Member

attributes.content: That girl really is—
attributes.name: Babel Member

attributes.content: Urgh...
attributes.name: Babel Member

attributes.content: This one's handled. Proceed.
attributes.name: Cautious Assassin

attributes.content: Our men on the inside are already on standby at every ambush spot. We can begin a coordinated assault at any time.
attributes.name: Determined Assassin

attributes.content: If you see anyone, don't hesitate. Those left on the ship are no threat.
attributes.name: Determined Assassin

attributes.content: I brought my book, Theresa—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Huh? Why is the door shut?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Theresa, it's me! Are you in there?
attributes.name: Amiya
Amiya
attributes.content: Closure once taught me another way to open the door...

attributes.name: Amiya
attributes.content: It's open!
attributes.joined: Closure once taught me another way to open the door... It's open!

attributes.content: Theresa—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What are you doing here, Amiya?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: I heard some loud noises that sounded really close... I got a little scared.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We can go home soon.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: You look tired...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Would you like to stay with me while I work?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Is this... a storybook?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: I see. Well, as long as it's for you, I think I can take a short break. The Doctor and Dr. Kal'tsit won't mind.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Thank you, Theresa!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Alright, come sit over here. Once we finish this story, I'll take you to my homeland to play.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: So, where did we leave off last time?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Stand back, Duq'arael.
attributes.name: Nezzsalem

attributes.content: You are covered in the blood of the mediocre.
attributes.name: Nezzsalem

attributes.content: Merely some heirs making ridiculous comments on the situation. Nobody should be making light of that pair of siblings' lives or deaths at this moment.
attributes.name: Duq'arael

attributes.content: It is a grave disrespect.
attributes.name: Duq'arael

attributes.content: Should you not be retreating and defending the inner city right now, Nezzsalem?
attributes.name: Duq'arael

attributes.content: That has nothing to do with the war I am waiting for.
attributes.name: Nezzsalem

attributes.content: Theresis asked you to come and ensure her death?
attributes.name: Duq'arael

attributes.content: Is this not you being contemptuous of those siblings yourself? The Regent would not stoop to such methods.
attributes.name: Nezzsalem

attributes.content: I am only here to witness the end of this war, and the beginning of another.
attributes.name: Nezzsalem

attributes.content: If the King of Sarkaz is struck down, I will bear the deathly pall of this moment. On behalf of the King, I will witness the victory I grasp from the abyss.
attributes.name: Nezzsalem

attributes.content: So, you still feel sorrow.
attributes.name: Duq'arael

attributes.content: As do you.
attributes.name: Nezzsalem

attributes.content: The wreath of reeds slowly sinks into the riverbed. The gloomy mists have not dispersed for days.
Aefanyl... Are you still by her side?
attributes.name: Laqeramaline

attributes.content: For whom does the elegy ring out?
attributes.name: Laqeramaline

attributes.content: Why did you stop, Theresa? We just got to the important part of the story!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I thought I'd leave a little suspense for you, Amiya. Would you mind if I used another, more comfortable way to tell you this story?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: But... Okay.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Watch out, Amiya.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: A bubble! Huh? This is—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Black ripples continuously wash over the pure white room, as though Amiya has plunged into a pool filled with ink.
The black bubbles cut off all sound, just as they obscure Amiya's sight.
Beyond the bubbles, Theresa's figure becomes more and more indistinct.
Retreating further into the distance.
There...sa...?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Stay inside for now, Amiya. Sleep well.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: You will be safe by my side.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Theresa. Your Highness...
attributes.name: Determined Assassin

attributes.content: We will use our lives as proof of the future that the General pursues.
attributes.name: Determined Assassin

attributes.content: No, I was sighing about something else.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Honestly, there is no need to cover your face in front of me.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: I still remember you from back when you accepted Yliš's orders before his chariot. Your heroism and valor in that battle moved me.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: I remember most of your fellows as well.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: You are all worthy of the title of 'brave warrior', in no way inferior to those heroes fighting in Kazdel this very moment.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: We aren't covering our faces to hide our identities. We knew they would do nothing here.
attributes.name: Determined Assassin

attributes.content: We have cut off our horns, abandoned our names, even destroyed every inch of our skin that can be used to identify us. All so that after we use such wretched methods to kill the King of Sarkaz—
attributes.name: Determined Assassin

attributes.content: We will not be remembered by the Sarkaz. We can't be remembered.
attributes.name: Determined Assassin

attributes.content: Do it.
attributes.name: Determined Assassin

attributes.content: The rushing air engulfs the assassins' blades like a swamp, as they incessantly stab forwards.
Swoosh—
The trembling of the blades causes the air surrounding them to resonate. They press on. They continue to stab.
The ones holding the blades are buffeted and submerged by waves they cannot resist.
I remember your names.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: I remember you. Luca.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: You held back a Steam Knight on your own. You hid yourself within the steam to pull them out, and beheaded them before friend and foe.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: The assassin's life fades away.
I remember you too. Liens.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Out of the countless Sarkaz with that name, you are the one who stood out most. After being taken captive by Spire Casters, you freed three of your compatriots from their camp and destroyed their Arts Circle.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Another death, and yet it cannot stop them from approaching Theresa.
And then you. Levin.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: You took an arrow for Theresis, losing an arm in the process, but survived hell itself until you managed to retreat.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: I do not wish for you all to die nameless and unknown.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: At the very least... I will remember.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: More and more corpses pile up by her side, while the room she has left to stand is whittled away, little by little.
She sighs, wiping the blood from her neck, accidentally smearing the dark red across her white dress.
We want to do something for the Sarkaz before we die. And so now we stand before you...
attributes.name: Determined Assassin

attributes.content: We have come to kill you. The King we once swore an oath of loyalty to.
attributes.name: Determined Assassin

attributes.content: We know your strength better than anyone. So, allow us damned traitors to escort you to hell.
attributes.name: Determined Assassin
